learning_objective: Organize and present collected data visually to highlight relationships and support a claim.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex conducted a survey of their classmates regarding the number of hours they sleep each day and their ability to concentrate in class. They found that students who sleep 8 hours a day tend to rate their ability to concentrate in class as 'high', while those who sleep 6 hours or less rate it as 'low'.  Which type of chart or graph would best illustrate this apparent relationship?",
    "Answer1": "Bar chart",
    "Answer2": "Pie chart",
    "Answer3": "Scatter plot",
    "Answer4": "Line chart",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "A scatter plot is the best choice to illustrate a potential relationship between two variables, in this case hours of sleep and ability to concentrate. A scatter plot allows a direct comparison between the variables and can show whether trends exist within the data."
}
